DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect micellar curcumin inflammation lipid metabolism marker subject risk metabolic syndrome .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Total cholesterol > 5.2 mmol/L LDL cholesterol > 3.4 mmol/L Triglyceride > 2.26 mmol/L CRP > 2 mg/L Exclusion criterion : Intake drug dietary supplement Pregnant woman breastfeed mother Smokers Previous illnesses heart attack , cancer dementia Addiction
